categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Kath subjugation was the conquest of the ocean-covered world Kath by the Galactic Empire. It used a number of the then-new Aquadon CAVa 400 aquatic attack vehicles to make underwater attacks against the forces of the Alliance to Restore the Republic, who had taken up positions within the Karm Trenches. The subjugation led to extensive civilian causalities.
